item.title: Understanding Movies through Data
item.description: Prelude: What makes movies good or bad? Is it our emotional response towards them? Is it the critical reviews or the scores? Is it the association of popular directors or actors? Is it the amount they gross at the box office? What is it really that describes their success or failure? I have pondered over such questions many a times but never really got around to acknowledge them.
